verbs.description: A clip of President Trump and Mike Pence at FEMA headquarters on Wednesday [V: has] gone viral . What is happening with those water bottles ? How are they so in sync ?
[ARG1: A clip of President Trump and Mike Pence at FEMA headquarters on Wednesday] has [V: gone] [ARG2: viral] . [ARGM-ADV: What is happening with those water bottles] ? How are they so in sync ?
A clip of President Trump and Mike Pence at FEMA headquarters on Wednesday has gone viral . What [V: is] happening with those water bottles ? How are they so in sync ?
A clip of President Trump and Mike Pence at FEMA headquarters on Wednesday has gone viral . [ARG1: What] is [V: happening] [ARG2: with those water bottles] ? How are they so in sync ?
A clip of President Trump and Mike Pence at FEMA headquarters on Wednesday has gone viral . What is happening with those water bottles ? How [V: are] [ARG1: they] [ARG2: so in sync] ?
